<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>public</access><active>true</active><api_name>x_fru_cir.CIRgetDepartments</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>false</client_callable><description>Return the departments that are being referenced in Locations</description><name>CIRgetDepartments</name><script><![CDATA[var CIRgetDepartments = Class.create();
CIRgetDepartments.prototype = {
    initialize: function() {},

    getDepartments: function(country, state, city) {

        if (!city && !country && !state) {
            return this.getJoinedQuery();
        }

        var grLoc = new GlideRecord(CIRConstants.Tables.LOCATION);
        city ? grLoc.addQuery('city', city) : '';
        country ? grLoc.addQuery('country', country) : '';
        state ? grLoc.addQuery('state', state) : '';

        grLoc.query();

        var departments = [];

        while (grLoc.next()) {

            if (departments.indexOf(grLoc.x_fru_cir_main_department.sys_id + '') == -1) {
                departments.push(grLoc.x_fru_cir_main_department.sys_id + '');
            }
        }

        return departments.toString();
    },

    getJoinedQuery: function() {
        var depts = [];

        var deptGR = new GlideRecord("cmn_department");
        deptGR.addJoinQuery(CIRConstants.Tables.LOCATION, "sys_id", "main_department"); // field building_type is a reference to Facility Types table
        deptGR.query();

        while (deptGR.next()) {
            depts.push(deptGR.main_department + '');
        }

        return depts;
    },

    type: 'CIRgetDepartments'
};]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>lopez-aznar@dxc.com</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2021-02-23 00:18:35</sys_created_on><sys_id>3b1819f41b226410d4bca977b04bcbfc</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>CIRgetDepartments</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Corporate Incident Response" source="x_fru_cir">265c101f13ab44100b8670a76144b0a2</sys_package><sys_policy>read</sys_policy><sys_scope display_value="Corporate Incident Response">265c101f13ab44100b8670a76144b0a2</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_3b1819f41b226410d4bca977b04bcbfc</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>lopez-aznar@dxc.com</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2021-02-23 00:32:23</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>
